content: The main reason Yukiko dated Xander in the first place was to give him a reason not to turn evil via the book he had.
Dennis was trained in martial arts, but dreamed of being good at throwing daggers, and practiced a lot. He didn't make much progress.
Ikiru enjoys playing the pan pipes and dancing in her free time, and when noone is watching.

Shiroe Pandora's closest friends are a stoic warforged, trying coming to come to terms with the realisation that he may or may not have a soul, and that that means, and a very silent girl of unknown origin who spends most of her time staring off into another dimension.
He masks the loneliness with his upbeat attitude and music.
Shiroe Pandora's first name is Tavintir in origin, despite not having any ties to the place. It is also not pronounced the way it typically would be in Tavintir.
